dmca.title: Video DMCA (Copyright) Complaint to Twitter
dmca.body:
---------------------------------------------
[redacted], Jun-26 01:34 am (PDT):

I am a person authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive

[redacted]
[redacted].
Chatsworth, CA
91311
[redacted]

The following works are copyrighted works of Abby Winters and a 
representative list of these works is as follows:
Term: Abby Winters
Term: AbbyWinters

Infringing status updates:
http://twitter.com/4sexylady/status/84778488715935744
http://twitter.com/portaldaputaria/status/84048556297691136
http://twitter.com/stunninglady/status/84778609927131136
http://twitter.com/warcentrum/status/84404607270391808

I have a good faith belief that use of the material in the manner
complained of is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agents, or
the law.

The information in the notice is accurate, under penalty of perjury.
-- 

[redacted]
Authorized DMCA Agent
